cui_name: Primary cholangiocarcinoma of intrahepatic biliary tract
reasoning: Intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma incidence ~0.85 per 100k globally from cancer registries. Second most common primary liver malignancy after HCC. Rising incidence noted in Western countries.
source: Khan SA et al. (2005). Cholangiocarcinoma. Lancet. 366(9493):1303-1314
